info.author: Tetrad Implemented by Peter Schaldenbrand pschalde@cs.cmu.edu
info.abstract:
The Discretizer component uses Tetrad functinality to make variables' data discrete.
Tetrad Website
info.options:
Variables- Select the variables you wish to make discrete.
Distribution- Evenly distribute values make sure each category has equal numbers of instances. Evenly distribute Intervals ensures that the intervals on which to split the categories are even.
NumCategories- is the number of categories to split the variables' data into.
